mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT , book_recommend.account_id , book_recommend.isbn , book_info.title , book_info.author , book_info.publisher , book_info.date_published , book_info.image_url FROM book_recommend, member, book_info WHERE (book_recommend.isbn = book_info.isbn) AND (book_recommend.account_id = member.account_id) AND (book_recommend.account_id = #{account_id}) ORDER BY recommend_id DESC
